name: OXO Good Grips Heavy Duty Scrub Brush
short_description: Perfect for tubs, tile walls, countertops, floors and more

product_description: Product Description The OXO Soft Works Heavy Duty Scrub Brush is perfect for cleaning countertops, tubs, shower stalls, concrete floors and other large surfaces. The two types of stiff nylon bristles won't lose their shape, no matter how hard you scrub. The Brush features a durable handle that fits the palm of your hand, and a soft, pressure-absorbing grip that won’t slip, even when wet. Amazon.com This scrubber is perfect for countertops and other large work surfaces because of its wide bristle area. With two types of stiff nylon bristles to tackle the chore, the bar brush is great for tile, Corian, Formica, or even polished concrete--bristles won't lose their shape no matter how hard you scrub. The Good Grips line features durable, nonslip flexible handles on every product. Ergonomically designed to fit the palm comfortably and softly, the pressure-absorbing processed rubber handle puts less tension on the hands, while providing an outstanding grip. Made from the same material as dishwasher gaskets are constructed of, the handles are slip-proof, wet or dry, as well as dishwasher-safe. Good Grips products are moderately priced and have won the Tylenol/Arthritis Foundation Design Award. --Laurie Notaro

The small brush, with its compact bristle head and pointed bristle profile, is great for cleaning in and around fixtures, thin grout lines and other tight spaces. It also features a built-in wiper blade that removes built up dirt from drains and other crevices.

name: Electric Spin Scrubber, Electric Spin Cordless Tub and Tile Scrubber with Voice Broadcasting 3 Speed 9 Replaceable Clean Heads Power Spin Scrubbers
short_description: 【RICH ACCESSORIES】Electric scrubber for cleaning with long handle with 9 replaceable brush heads for tailored cleaning in kitchens, bathroom tiles, and glass. It includes 2 adjustable telescopic rods for easy length customization from 12.8" to 53", enabling comfortable cleaning without kneeling and reaching difficult spots.

【3 ADJUSTABLE SPEEDS & IPX7 WATERPROOF】The electric cleaning brush offers 3 speeds for versatile cleaning: 280rpm for daily grime, 380rpm for stubborn spots, and 430rpm for heavy-duty tasks. Quickly switch with the press of a button. Its IPX7 waterproof allows for hassle-free post-clean rinse; just dunk under water. Disclaimer: The main unit is not for submersion or underwater use.

【FAST CHARGING & LONG-LASTING BATTERY】Powered by a 2500mAh battery, our cordless scrubber provides up to 100 minutes of continuous cleaning. The battery's remaining capacity is clearly displayed on the built-in screen, ensuring you're never caught off guard by sudden power loss. Quickly recharge using the included Type-C cable in just 3 hours, so you can keep your home spotless without interruption.

【VOICE ANNOUNCEMENT FEATURE】Our bathroom scrubber is equipped with a voice prompt function that announces the current speed setting when activated. This feature allows you to easily identify the gear in use, eliminating the need to guess or feel around. Adjust the speed according to the cleaning area and stain difficulty for an effortless cleaning experience, making household chores more relaxed.

【EXCEPTIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICE】Our commitment to high-quality products is matched by our dedication to excellent after-sales support. Should you encounter any issues with your electric scrubber, such as damage during shipping or problems while in use, we're ready to assist promptly with repairs or replacements. With its cordless convenience and practicality, this spin scrubber makes the perfect gift for loved ones, ensuring a clean and comfortable home environment.
